Comment: I don't know why people on Reddit act like it's a problem that the Republicans are "only doing it so they don't lose their seat." Yes, this is the backstop of democracy, why democracy WORKS at all. Because even the most heinous asshole who is an elected official has to wonder whether they can keep their seat. That's it. That's the bar for a functioning democracy. It's ugly and pitiful and doesn't say much about human beings in general. But I'll take it! I'll take self-centered narcissists in politics doing the right thing (for their constituents) for bad reasons (self-interest only).
